title: RBI Gov tells lenders to be cautious while extending consumption related personal loans
description: The Reserve Bank of India governor Shaktikanta Das urged caution in issuing personal loans for consumption, highlighting heightened risks in the unsecured segment. Despite pre-emptive regulatory measures, unsecured advances showed stress. Credit growth overall slowed down, emphasizing the need for stringent monitoring to avoid potential risks in the financial sector.
